vernac_cmds: Definition Fibred1_p : Fibred1_prod --> G P1 := Limiting_cone l P1.
Definition Fibred1_q : Fibred1_prod --> G P3 := Limiting_cone l P3.
Lemma Prf_pb1_law1 : Pullback_law1 (FMor G F12) (FMor G F32) Fibred1_p Fibred1_q.
Variables (r : C) (t1 : r --> G P1) (t2 : r --> G P3).
Hypothesis H : Pullback_eq1 (FMor G F12) (FMor G F32) t1 t2.
Definition Pulb_tau (a : PULB) := match a as a' return (Carrier (r --> G a')) with | P1 => t1 | P2 => t1 o FMor G F12 | P3 => t2 end.
unfold Cone_law in |- *; intros x x1 t.
elim t; simpl in |- *; unfold FMor at 1 in |- *; simpl in |- *.
apply Trans with (t1 o Id (G P1)).
apply Trans with ((t1 o FMor G F12) o Id (G P2)).
apply Trans with (t2 o Id (G P3)).
Definition Pulb_cone : Cone r G := Pulb_cone_law.
Definition Pb1_diese : r --> Fibred1_prod := Lim_diese l Pulb_cone.
unfold Pullback_law2, Pullback_eq1, Pullback_eq2 in |- *; intros r t1 t2 H.
apply Sym; apply (Prf_limit1 l (Pulb_cone H) P1).
unfold Pullback_law3, Pullback_eq1, Pullback_eq2 in |- *; intros r t1 t2 H.
apply Sym; apply (Prf_limit1 l (Pulb_cone H) P3).
Lemma Prf_pb1_law4 : Pullback_law4 Fibred1_p Fibred1_q Pb1_diese.
unfold Pullback_law4, Pullback_eq1, Pullback_eq2 in |- *; intros r t1 t2 H h H1 H2.
intro x; elim x; simpl in |- *.
apply Trans with (h o Fibred1_p o FMor G F12).
apply Trans with ((h o Fibred1_p) o FMor G F12).
Canonical Structure Pullback1_to_Pullback := Build_Pullback Prf_pb1_law1 Prf_pb1_law2 Prf_pb1_law3 Prf_pb1_law4.
Variables (C : Category) (a b c : C) (f : a --> b) (g : c --> b).
Definition Fpulb_ob (x : PULB) := match x return (Ob C) with | P1 => a | P2 => b | P3 => c end.

Definition Fpulb_mor (x y : PULB) (h : PULB_mor_setoid x y) := match h in (PULB_mor x' y') return (Carrier (Fpulb_ob x' --> Fpulb_ob y')) with | IP1 => Id a | IP2 => Id b | IP3 => Id c | F12 => f | F32 => g end.
Lemma Fpulb_map_law : forall x y : PULB_ob, Map_law (Fpulb_mor (x:=x) (y:=y)).
unfold Map_law in |- *; intros x y h1.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_11_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P1 => Equal_PULB_mor IP1 t -> Id a =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => Equal_PULB_mor IP2 t -> Id b =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_33_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P3 P3 => Equal_PULB_mor IP3 t -> Id c =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_12_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P2 => Equal_PULB_mor F12 t -> f =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_32_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P3 P2 => Equal_PULB_mor F32 t -> g =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
Canonical Structure Fpulb_map (x y : PULB) := Build_Map (Fpulb_map_law (x:=x) (y:=y)).
unfold Fcomp_law in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros x y z h1.
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_11_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P1 => Id a =_S Id a o Fpulb_mor t)).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_12_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P2 => f =_S Id a o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_13_ind (fun t : PULB_mor P1 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP1 h2) =_S Id a o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
apply (PULB_21_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP2 h2) =_S Id b o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => Id b =_S Id b o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_23_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP2 h2) =_S Id b o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
apply (PULB_31_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P3 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP3 h2) =_S Id c o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; apply (PULB_32_ind (P:=fun a : PULB_mor P3 P2 => g =_S Id c o Fpulb_mor a)).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_33_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P3 P3 => Id c =_S Id c o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_21_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F12 h2) =_S f o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => f =_S f o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_23_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F12 h2) =_S f o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
apply (PULB_21_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F32 h2) =_S g o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => g =_S g o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_23_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F32 h2) =_S g o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
unfold Fid_law in |- *; simpl in |- *; intro x.
elim x; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
Canonical Structure Fpulb := Build_Functor Fpulb_comp_law Fpulb_id_law.

command: unfold Cone_law in |- *; intros x x1 t.
elim t; simpl in |- *; unfold FMor at 1 in |- *; simpl in |- *.
apply Trans with (t1 o Id (G P1)).
apply Trans with ((t1 o FMor G F12) o Id (G P2)).
apply Trans with (t2 o Id (G P3)).
unfold Pullback_law2, Pullback_eq1, Pullback_eq2 in |- *; intros r t1 t2 H.
apply Sym; apply (Prf_limit1 l (Pulb_cone H) P1).
unfold Pullback_law3, Pullback_eq1, Pullback_eq2 in |- *; intros r t1 t2 H.
apply Sym; apply (Prf_limit1 l (Pulb_cone H) P3).
unfold Pullback_law4, Pullback_eq1, Pullback_eq2 in |- *; intros r t1 t2 H h H1 H2.
intro x; elim x; simpl in |- *.
apply Trans with (h o Fibred1_p o FMor G F12).
apply Trans with ((h o Fibred1_p) o FMor G F12).
unfold Map_law in |- *; intros x y h1.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_11_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P1 => Equal_PULB_mor IP1 t -> Id a =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => Equal_PULB_mor IP2 t -> Id b =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_33_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P3 P3 => Equal_PULB_mor IP3 t -> Id c =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_12_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P2 => Equal_PULB_mor F12 t -> f =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
intro h2; lapply (PULB_32_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P3 P2 => Equal_PULB_mor F32 t -> g =_S Fpulb_mor t)).
intros H H0; apply (H h2 H0).
intro H; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
unfold Fcomp_law in |- *; simpl in |- *; intros x y z h1.
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_11_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P1 => Id a =_S Id a o Fpulb_mor t)).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_12_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P1 P2 => f =_S Id a o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_13_ind (fun t : PULB_mor P1 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP1 h2) =_S Id a o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
apply (PULB_21_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP2 h2) =_S Id b o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => Id b =_S Id b o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_23_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP2 h2) =_S Id b o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
apply (PULB_31_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P3 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor IP3 h2) =_S Id c o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; apply (PULB_32_ind (P:=fun a : PULB_mor P3 P2 => g =_S Id c o Fpulb_mor a)).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_33_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P3 P3 => Id c =_S Id c o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_21_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F12 h2) =_S f o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => f =_S f o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_23_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F12 h2) =_S f o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
apply (PULB_21_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P1 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F32 h2) =_S g o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
simpl in |- *; lapply (PULB_22_ind (P:=fun t : PULB_mor P2 P2 => g =_S g o Fpulb_mor t)).
apply (PULB_23_ind (fun a : PULB_mor P2 P3 => Fpulb_mor (Comp_PULB_mor F32 h2) =_S g o Fpulb_mor h2) h2).
unfold Fid_law in |- *; simpl in |- *; intro x.
elim x; simpl in |- *; apply Refl.
